title: Roche Holding AG
description: The primary brand color of Roche Holding AG is a distinctive shade of blue, designated by the hex code #007AC2. This choice of color is commonly associated with reliability, professionalism, and trust, aligning with Roche's reputation in the healthcare industry. As a multinational biotechnology company, Roche's brand color is prominently visible through various corporate materials and digital platforms, reaffirming its identity across global markets.
